oojsplus-color-picker-color-blue: Name of a field in a color-picker widget
oojsplus-color-picker-color-red: Name of a field in a color-picker widget
oojsplus-color-picker-color-green: Name of a field in a color-picker widget
oojsplus-color-picker-color-yellow: Name of a field in a color-picker widget
oojsplus-color-picker-color-orangered: Name of a field in a color-picker widget
oojsplus-color-picker-color-olive: Name of a field in a color-picker widget
oojsplus-color-picker-color-pink: Name of a field in a color-picker widget
oojsplus-color-picker-clear-label:
Label of a button that removes a color selection
{{doc-important|That means ''clear'' is a verb here. This message is about ''clearing a colour'' as in resetting it, '''not''' about ''a clear colour''!}}
oojsplus-color-picker-label: Default label of a color-picker widget
oojsplus-data-delete-row-prompt: Prompt text before user deletes a row in a grid
oojsplus-data-paginator-page-total-count:
Label for the total number of rows in a grid data source. 
 $1 = Number of rows
oojsplus-data-tree-item-remove-label:
Tree label for the button in item options that removed the selected node
{{Identical|Remove}}
oojsplus-data-tree-item-add-label: Tree label for the button in item options that adds new subnode to the selected node
oojsplus-stepprogressbar-default-final-l: Default label for the last step in StepProgressBar widget
oojsplus-dialog-action-done:
Label for action done in dialog

{{Identical|Done}}
oojsplus-dialog-action-delete:
Label for action delete in dialog

{{Identical|Delete}}
oojsplus-dialog-action-create:
Label for action create in dialog

{{Identical|Create}}
oojsplus-dialog-action-add:
Label for action add in dialog

{{Identical|Add}}
oojsplus-dialog-action-cancel:
Label for action cancel in dialog

{{Identical|Cancel}}
oojsplus-data-grid-widget-popup-title: Label for popup button to see all added items
oojsplus-data-grid-filter-clear: Label for the clear filter button
oojsplus-data-paginator-aria-label: Label for the page switching widget
oojsplus-data-paginator-next: Label for button to switch to next page
oojsplus-data-paginator-previous: Label for button to switch to previous page
oojsplus-data-paginator-first: Label for button to switch to first page
oojsplus-data-paginator-last: Label for button to switch to last page
oojsplus-data-grid-toolbar-reload-label: Label for the reload button in the data grid
oojsplus-data-paginator-page-number-swit: Hint for screen reader users to navigate to the page number
oojsplus-data-paginator-page-number-butt:
Label for the page number button

Parameters:
* $1 - page number
oojsplus-data-paginator-page-showed-sing:
Display message for a single entry shown

Parameters:
* $1 - index of the entry shown
oojsplus-data-paginator-page-showed-many:
Display message for multiple entries shown

Parameters:
* $1 - index of the first entry shown
* $2 - index of the last entry shown
oojsplus-data-grid-filter-boolean: Label for the grid filter boolean field
oojsplus-data-tree-item-remove-confirm-l:
Label for confirm that element should be removed

Parameters:
* $1 - name of element
oojsplus-data-grid-filter-operator:
Label for the filter field
{{identical|Comparison type}}
oojsplus-data-grid-grouper-no-group: Label for the grid group if no group name is specified
oojsplus-data-grid-filter-close: Used as title of a button
oojsplus-namespace-content-talk: Grouping label for content talk namespace
oojsplus-namespace-system-talk: Grouping label for system talk namespace
oojsplus-data-grid-filter-update-active-:
Label for applied filtering
Parameters:
* $1 - number of filters
* $2 - list of names of filters
oojsplus-data-grid-filter-update-results:
Label for results found from filtering
Parameters:
* $1 - number of results
oojsplus-data-grid-filter-update-no-filt: Label for no applied filter in grid
oojsplus-data-grid-toolbar-settings-aria: Invisible label for settings button in grid
oojsplus-data-grid-filter-title:
Label for the filter button

Parameters:
* $1 - name of filter
oojsplus-data-grid-filter-list-with-valu:
Label to name filter with value
Paramters:
* $1 - name of filter
* $2 - value of filter
oojsplus-data-grid-sort-direction-none:
Label for announcing no sorting of a column

Parameters:
* $1 - name of column
oojsplus-data-grid-sort-direction-desc:
Label for announcing descending sorting of a column

Parameters:
* $1 - name of column
oojsplus-data-grid-sort-direction-asc:
Label for announcing ascending sorting of a column

Parameters:
* $1 - name of column
oojsplus-data-grid-date-filter-announce-:
Announcement for selecting date filter. Filters for items before selected date
* $1 - Selected date

Announcement for selecting date filter. Filters for items after selected date
* $1 - Selected date

Announcement for selecting date filter. Filters for items on selected date.
* $1 - Selected date
oojsplus-data-grid-filter-boolean-true:
Filter options label for boolean field
{{Identical|Yes}}
oojsplus-data-grid-filter-boolean-false:
Filter options label for boolean field
{{Identical|No}}
oojsplus-data-grid-collapse-expand: Label for button to expand table content
oojsplus-data-grid-collapse-collapse: Label for button to collapse table content
oojsplus-toolbar-cancel: Label for cancel button in toolbar{{Identical|Cancel}}
oojsplus-toolbar-save: Label for save button in toolbar{{Identical|Save}}
oojsplus-toolbar-delete: Label for delete button in toolbar{{Identical|Delete}}
oojsplus-toolbar-edit: Label for edit button in toolbar{{Identical|Edit}}
oojsplus-toolbar-add: Label for add button in toolbar{{Identical|Add}}
oojsplus-data-grid-filter-date-on:
Filter options label for date field
{{Identical|On}}
oojsplus-data-grid-filter-date-after:
Filter options label for date field

oojsplus-data-grid-filter-date-before:
Filter options label for date field

oojsplus-data-grid-no-results: Label for grid when no results are available

oojsplus-sort-direction-desc: Label for sorting in descending order
